name: EmploymentStatus
title: Employment Status
description: Determination of employment status (employed, unemployed, retired, etc) of the patient. (Business ID: Entry 115499)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Employment Status.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of employment status (employed, unemployed, retired, etc) of the patient..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Employment Status.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Employment Status.)

contains.display: Are you working now, looking for work, retired, keeping house, a student, or what [PhenX]
Do you currently have a job or do any unpaid work outside your home [IPAQ]
Are you unemployed or without regular income [WellRx]
Do you need help finding a better job [WellRx]
